description.value:
School transmutation; Level alchemist 3, antipaladin 3, hunter 4, occultist 3, psychic 3, ranger 4, sorcerer/wizard 3;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S, M (either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate)

Range touch
Targets creatures touched
Duration 1 hour/level
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless); Spell Resistance yes

Description

This spell functions like darkvision, except you may divide the duration in 1-hour intervals among the creatures touched.

materials.value: either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate
